mapper.sql: TIPSTAFF_ID, TIPSTAFF_NAME, TIPSTAFF_SEX, TIPSTAFF_ORG, TIPSTAFF_DEPARTMENT, TIPSTAFF_POSITION, TIPSTAFF_PERSONAL_MAILBOX, PHONE_NUMBER, REMARK
mapper.select:
select
from APP_TIPSTAFF_ADDRESSLIST where 1 = 1
and TIPSTAFF_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{tipstaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and TIPSTAFF_SEX=#{tipstaffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into APP_TIPSTAFF_ADDRESSLIST
TIPSTAFF_ID,
TIPSTAFF_NAME,
TIPSTAFF_SEX,
TIPSTAFF_ORG,
TIPSTAFF_DEPARTMENT,
TIPSTAFF_POSITION,
TIPSTAFF_PERSONAL_MAILBOX,
PHONE_NUMBER,
REMARK,

#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update APP_TIPSTAFF_ADDRESSLIST
TIPSTAFF_NAME = #{tipstaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIPSTAFF_SEX = #{tipstaffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIPSTAFF_ORG = #{tipstaffOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIPSTAFF_DEPARTMENT = #{tipstaffDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIPSTAFF_POSITION = #{tipstaffPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIPSTAFF_PERSONAL_MAILBOX = #{tipstaffPersonalMailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TIPSTAFF_ID = #{tipstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update APP_TIPSTAFF_ADDRESSLIST set TIPSTAFF_NAME = #{tipstaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIPSTAFF_SEX = #{tipstaffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIPSTAFF_ORG = #{tipstaffOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIPSTAFF_DEPARTMENT = #{tipstaffDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIPSTAFF_POSITION = #{tipstaffPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIPSTAFF_PERSONAL_MAILBOX = #{tipstaffPersonalMailbox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TIPSTAFF_ID = #{tipstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
